data: Non-current assets (and liabilities) - based on fair value through profit or loss (and revaluation) model
Excluded: Held-to-maturity investments (and available-for-sale) - non-controlled equity (and debt) instruments
Provisions for long-term employee benefits (and long-term employee benefits) - related to deferred tax assets (liabilities)
Non-current assets (and liabilities) - after adjusting for profit or loss (and debt) instruments
